nodes.text: Benna Lodd was a female Mandalorian bounty hunter during the Cold War and Galactic War between the Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic, where she could be found selling armor to other hunters on Vaiken Spacedock.
She worn set of golden Republic trooper armor and a Mandalorian helmet.

Benna Lodd appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as the PvP Warzone Gear Vendor for the Bounty Hunter class on Vaiken Spacedock. She was later removed in Game Update 5.0 on November 29, 2016, which retired the PvP and PvE gear vendors in favor of the Command system.
